Quality indicator: Code A=Excellent. Code B=Very good. Code C=Good. Code D=Acceptable. Code E=Poor, use with caution. Code F=Unreliable (data not published).

For periods prior to January 2020, data for this Canadian industry are presented in an unadjusted form, because the seasonal pattern was still developing and seasonal adjustment would have had minimal influence on the data.
